items.text: direct hit would have sent him back. Or he may have just made it after that timely dive. A yorker that was dug out to cover. Chandimal immediately took off for a single and was sent back

items.preText: Anuruddha : "I see Asela Gunaratne is playing his final ODI. Give him a memorable farewell folks.."
items.text: oh, dear! A beamer that he ducks under but comes on dangerously high. Must have slipped out of the hand. Whatever it was, it earns him a free-hit and a warning
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Dananjaya, 1 no ball

items.text: stays leg side of this short ball and completely mistimes a pull. Needed to get closer to the line. Not much of a chance swinging like that. Missed opportunity there

athlete.name: Akila Dananjaya
athlete.fullName: Mahamarakkala Kurukulasooriya Patabendige Akila Dananjaya Perera

athlete.name: Akila Dananjaya
athlete.fullName: Mahamarakkala Kurukulasooriya Patabendige Akila Dananjaya Perera

items.text: is that another no-ball? Yup, it is. Another beamer on middle and off and Dananjaya backs away slightly to free himself up and muscles a pull over deep midwicket. Six, extra run, extra ball and a free-hit.Jeez, these are valuable late runs that they are leaking
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Dananjaya, (no ball) SIX runs

items.text: a perfect, searing yorker. Angled on middle and right on the money. Chandimal gets the front leg out, does not maintain any good position and swings across the line as the ball clatters into the stumps

athlete.name: Akila Dananjaya
athlete.fullName: Mahamarakkala Kurukulasooriya Patabendige Akila Dananjaya Perera

dismissal.text: LD Chandimal  b Rubel Hossain 45 (74b 0x4 1x6) SR: 60.81

full on middle and leg, punched to the right of mid-on
low full toss outside off, dips enough for it to almost become a yorker, drilled back

items.text: swing and a miss a fullish one curves in late from well outside off
items.shortText: Rubel Hossain to Madushanka, no run

items.text: another scorching yorker. Very similar to the one that cleaned up Chandimal. Madushanka can't get anywhere underneath that and swings and misses as the ball clatters into middle and off

dismissal.text: DSK Madushanka  b Rubel Hossain 7 (6b 1x4 0x6) SR: 116.66
